identity.name: Kuber Inventory System
identity.primary_objective: Streamline inventory management with visual elegance suitable for high-value jewellery and handicrafts.

typography.instructions: Use 'Playfair Display' ONLY for the main Brand Logo and top-level page titles (e.g., 'Dashboard', 'Inventory'). Use 'Manrope' for all UI elements, tables, forms, and data.

usage_rules: Background should be #FAFAF9 (Stone-50) to provide a subtle warm/creamy tone without compromising readability.
Use #00923F for Primary Buttons, Active States, and key Data Highlights.
Use #F2FCE2 (very light green) for active sidebar items or subtle backgrounds.
Never use pure black. Use #1C1917 (Stone-900) for text.

layout.spacing: Generous padding inside cards (p-6), tight gaps between data points.

sidebar.behavior: Fixed left, white background, border-r border-stone-200

dashboard_structure.description: Top row: 4 cards showing Total Stock, Low Stock Items, Total Value, Category Distribution.
Middle section: Large card (col-span-2) showing Sales/Inventory Movement History.
Right side: Narrow card showing recent additions or sales logs.
Bottom section: Full width table for 'Low Stock Alert' items.

buttons.primary: bg-[#00923F] hover:bg-[#007A35] text-white shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-stone-200 hover:bg-stone-50 text-stone-700 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all

cards.style: bg-white border border-stone-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200 rounded-xl

inputs.style: border-stone-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#00923F] focus:border-transparent rounded-md bg-white shadow-sm

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy dropshadows.
visual_enhancers.gradients: None. Stick to flat, clean colors. Maybe very subtle linear gradient on the Dashboard 'Total Value' card background (Green to slightly lighter Green).
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React icons. Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Color: #44403C (Stone-700).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: `npm install lucide-react recharts clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu @radix-ui/react-label @radix-ui/react-select @radix-ui/react-switch @radix-ui/react-tabs @radix-ui/react-toast @radix-ui/react-tooltip class-variance-authority` (or yarn equivalent).
2. FOLDER STRUCTURE: Create a `layouts` folder for `DashboardLayout` (Sidebar + Header + Content Area).
3. STATE MANAGEMENT: Use React Context or just simple State for the MVP. No complex Redux needed unless requested.
4. MOCK DATA: Create a `data/mockData.js` file using the image URLs provided to populate the Inventory List immediately so the user sees a populated dashboard.
5. CHARTS: Use 'Recharts' for the Analytics. Ensure the colors match the palette (Green/Emerald theme).
6. TABLES: The Product Table is the heart of this app. Make it beautiful. Include columns for Image (Avatar size), Name, SKU, Category, Price, Stock Level (with color-coded badge), and Actions.
7. EXPORT: For PDF/Excel export, just mock the button functionality with a toast 'Exporting...' or use `jspdf` / `xlsx` if you want to be extra fancy (but simple toast is fine for MVP UI focus).
8. ALERTS: Use 'Sonner' or standard Toast for 'Low Stock' warnings.
9. LOGIN: Create a simple, elegant Login page centered on screen. White card on #FAFAF9 background. Green primary button.
10. DO NOT use generic black. Always use the specified Stone/Grey codes.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on Green buttons is White. Text on light backgrounds must be Gray-700 or darker.
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have a visible focus ring (ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-[#00923F]).
